alert.note: Alert for Calcasieu (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 05 at 8:06PM CDT until April 08 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Louisiana... Calcasieu River NEAR White Oak Park Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Calcasieu River NEAR White Oak Park. * WHEN...Until Friday morning. * IMPACTS...At 2.0 feet, Minor flooding of Goos Ferry Road will occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:35 PM CDT Tuesday the stage was 2.4 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:35 PM CDT Tuesday was 2.5 feet. - Forecast...The river will oscillate above flood stage with a maximum value of 2.2 feet just after midnight tonight. It will fall below flood stage early Friday morning. - Flood stage is 2.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Wed Thu Fri Calcasieu River White Oak Park 2.0 2.4 Tue 7 pm CDT 2.2 2.1 1.9 &&
